CLUE: Brain operation, once used to treat mental illness
FOUND IN: **Lobotomy**: Also known as a leucotomy or transorbital leukotomy, this was a type of psychosurgery that involved severing connections between the prefrontal cortex and other parts of the brain to treat mental illnesses such as schizophrenia, depression, and anxiety
